director.name: Brooks T. Moore Brooks T. Moore

this_title: How it made: Dream Cars Season 3
trans_title: 制造的原理：梦幻名车 第三季
introduction: Picture your dream car: it probably looks like a Bugatti Veyron. Have you ever wondered just how that machine was made? Join the How It's Made crew as we go to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and gorgeous exterior
chinese_title: 制造的原理：梦幻名车 第三季
foreign_title: How it made: Dream Cars Season 3
